subject: E-Commerce
College Athletics
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
lead_paragraph: Facing legal and public scrutiny over its business practices, the N.C.A.A. said it would stop selling player jerseys and other memorabilia through its Web site.
snippet: Facing legal and public scrutiny over its business practices, the N.C.A.A. said it would stop selling player jerseys and other memorabilia through its Web site.
